nodes.text: Zonama Sekot was an astronomical object located in the Unknown Regions. It was situated in an otherwise empty and unexplored area westward of the desert world Jakku, which was located in the Western Reaches of the Inner Rim.

Zonama Sekot was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the StarWars.com article Where in the Galaxy Are the Worlds of Star Wars: The Force Awakens?, published on StarWars.com on January 29, 2016. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Zonama Sekot was first mentioned in the 2000 reference book The Essential Chronology.
